meanings.definition: A unit of time equal to one sextillionth of a second.
meanings.sent1: I waited for a zeptosecond before pressing the button.
meanings.sent2: The scientist measured the reaction time in zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent3: It only took a zeptosecond for the cat to realize the laser pointer was a trick.
meanings.sent4: The zeptosecond it took for the idea to hit him felt like an eternity.
meanings.sent5: In the blink of a zeptosecond, everything changed.

meanings.definition: The smallest unit of time measurement in the metric system.
meanings.sent1: She calculated the speed of light in zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent2: The computer processed data in mere zeptoseconds.
meanings.sent3: The zeptosecond it took for the snail to cross the finish line was record-breaking.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down to a zeptosecond when he saw her smile.
meanings.sent5: The zeptosecond between heartbeats felt like an eternity.
